feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.30
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • WebSockets: Add broadcast events by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10005
  • Add vi lang by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10027
  • New payment flow: PDF on the show page by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10035
  • GoCardless: OAuth by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9584
  • Update translations by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10041
  • GoCardless: Force sandbox for specific company by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10042
  • Fixes for Rotessa by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10045
  • Fixes for product sales export by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10052
  • GoCardless OAuth2: MultiDB by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10057
  • Fixes for Dependabot config by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10056
  • Fixes for template action regression by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10062
  • Fixes for validation of company import when migrating by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10064
  • InvoiceWasPaid: Don't broadcast to current user by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10051
  • v5.10.30 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10076

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.29...v5.10.30

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.31
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • v5.10.31 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10080
  • Merge Vendors
  • Add tests for bulk updates for expenses
  • Add Bulk Updates
  • Roll back schema
  • Disable the scout driver
  • minor fixes for Mollie
  • Fixes for BTC Pay
  • Fixes for tax summary
  • Parse floats to user formatted versions in exports
  • Fixes for export formats
  • Parse floats to user formatted versions in exports
  • Improve parsing of floats for Imports

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.30...v5.10.31

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.32
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update API docs by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10083
  • Switch order of commands for PDF generation by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10085
  • Fixes for migrations by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10087
  • updates for composer.json by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10088
  • Minor updates by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10089
  • Fixes for broadcast routes by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10090
  • Fixes for search controller by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10098

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.31...v5.10.32

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.33
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Feature] Add Taxation for Kleinunternehmerreglung and minor fixes by @LarsK1 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10082
  • Fixes for static analysis by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10099
  • Fixes for spacing in notes section by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10100
  • v5.10.33 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10110

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.32...v5.10.33
